fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Prosecute! (Day): Immediately kill your target. 0 uses. 1 use when revealed as the Marshal.
Interrogation! (Night): Immediately learn your target's role. 1 use. 1 use when revealed as the Marshal.
Town Politics (Day): Reveal yourself as the Marshal, gaining three votes and one use of each of your abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
For every attack level you take, lose one level of defense. (Ex: You take a powerful attack, your defense is now none.)
You lose if you reach a 1v1 and do not have a charge of Prosecute left.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would not follow martial law.
